title: Collaborative Learning-Based Anatomy Education Design for Interprofessional Healthcare Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary biology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to systematically learn gross anatomy and strengthen educational application capabilities through collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the anatomical structure and function of the liver
Learners can develop liver-related educational materials through collaborative learning activities with peers
Learners can design and evaluate liver anatomy educational scenarios in an LMS-based collaborative learning environment
Learners can determine the appropriate difficulty level of liver anatomy educational content and assessment methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
